MajorClaims.Text: my term of a successful man is one who has certain achievements in life rather than the one with a high income
using only money as a scale to measure a man's success is impossible

Claims.Text: it is the essential in basic needs
a man can only achieve his accomplishment through hard-working, dedication and passion
judging a person by his income is difficult, especially in the success aspect

Premises.Text: A person's great prosperity does not state that he has gained it ethically by himself
ways of earning it is also various
Whether it is a personal or a social achievement, that man is laudable
the more beneficial for the society his achievement is, the more successful he is considered
Thomas Edison is undeniably considered as one of the greatest inventors in the 20th century
his invention's productivity is countless useful for mankind
the fact of knowing a man's utilization of his money remains in the dark
